code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Button,Table}from'react-bootstrap';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{getTypesOfTradingPlaces,deleteTypeOfTradingPlace}from'../../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TypesOfTradingPlacesPage(){const[types,setTypes]=useState([]);const[showTable,setShowTable]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetchTypes();},[]);const fetchTypes=async()=>{try{const response=await getTypesOfTradingPlaces();setTypes(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Failed to fetch types of trading places',error);}};const handleDelete=async id=>{try{await deleteTypeOfTradingPlace(id);fetchTypes();}catch(error){console.error('Failed to delete type of trading place',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Types of Trading Places"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>setShowTable(!showTable),className:"btn btn-dark mb-2",children:showTable?'Hide Table':'Show Table'}),showTable&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"table-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/types_of_trading_places/add",className:"btn btn-dark mb-2",children:"Add Type of Trading Place"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{striped:true,bordered:true,hover:true,variant:"dark",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:types.map(type=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:type.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:type.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/types_of_trading_places/edit/".concat(type.id),className:"btn btn-danger",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleDelete(type.id),className:"btn btn-danger",style:{marginLeft:10},children:"Delete"})]})]},type.id))})]})]})]});}
